duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently provide hands-on maintenance and repair services to all areas of winery operations including equipment, infrastructure, fixtures, furnishings, and buildings.

Perform routine and preventative maintenance of all winery equipment and facilities, including cellar equipment, crush equipment, water supply, wastewater and storm-water systems, heating and cooling systems, wine tanks, buildings, and vehicles.
Demonstrate strong understanding and troubleshooting skills in electrical systems, control circuits, control components, PLCs, ladder logic diagrams, refrigeration processes, and welding.
Lead other lower-level mechanics on various projects and perform plumbing, rough carpentry, and finish work as needed.
Complete assignments and work orders with minimal supervision, operate industrial equipment, and prioritize safety procedures.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED or equivalent experience
8-10 Years of maintenance experience in a winery setting
